title: I click on the YouTube app and I get a pop up saying "YouTube keeps stopping" and app is closed.
content:
I bought a new pixel 3. I started the phone, did the initial setup and then tried opening YouTube app. I clicked on the app, it opens and closes immediately. I tried opening it again and then the same happens and I get a pop up stating "YouTube keeps stopping"

I've tried all the suggestions I already found in pixel support. Tried updating, tried force stop, tried cleaning the cache. Nothing was helping.

Its little annoying to see this behavior on a brand new phone.

Any kind of help to fix this issue would be really appreciated. I'm also attaching a screenshot of the popup.

Thanks in advance.
